entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text: @realDonaldTrump Tubby Trump will be addressing the coronavirus pandemic to the Redumblicans in red hats in SC. They love the King of Corruption! They think he knows what he is doing! They love that he misappropriates money from the military to illegally pay for his Mexican wall.
